mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop_commodity_info c INNER JOIN shop_info i ON c.shop_id = i.shop_id INNER JOIN shop_collection sc ON sc.commodity_id = c.commodity_id WHERE i.uid = 'user1' AND i.`status` = 0 AND c.`status` = 0 AND sc.`status` = 0

select avatar_imag, i.commodity_name as shop_commodity_name, i.price, i.commodity_id, info.shop_name, info.user_image FROM shop_collection sc INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info i ON sc.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join shop_info info on info.shop_id = i.shop_id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 AND sc.`status` = 0 order by sc.update_time desc LIMIT #{page},#{limit}

SELECT i.avatar_imag, i.commodity_name , i.price, h.create_time as accessTime, i.commodity_id, s.shop_name, s.user_image FROM shop_commodity_history h INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info i ON h.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join shop_info s on s.shop_id=i.shop_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 LIMIT #{page},#{limit}

SELECT ui.uid, ui.user_name, ui.user_image, sci.commodity_id, sci.commodity_name, sci.avatar_imag, sci.price, sci.status FROM user_info as ui INNER JOIN shop_info as si on ui.uid = si.uid INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info as sci on si.shop_id = sci.shop_id WHERE si.uid = #{uid} and sci.status = #{status} LIMIT #{page} , #{limit}

select count(*) FROM shop_collection sc INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info i ON sc.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join shop_info info on info.shop_id = i.shop_id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 AND sc.`status` = 0

SELECT count(*) FROM shop_commodity_history h INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info i ON h.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join shop_info s on s.shop_id=i.shop_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0
select count(1) FROM shop_commodity_info i WHERE i.shop_id=#{shopId}
select i.commodity_id, i.commodity_name, i.avatar_imag, i.status, i.price FROM shop_commodity_info i WHERE i.shop_id=#{shopId}
